thread.title: One-of-a-Kind: Cricketers who played only one Test match for India
thread.title_full: One-of-a-Kind: Cricketers who played only one Test match for India - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: One-of-a-Kind: Cricketers who played only one Test match for India
text:
Today we celebrate the birth anniversary of former Indian cricketer Arvind Apte. On this occasion, we take a look at the list of Indian cricketers who played just one Test match for their country.

Runs - 15, Highest - 8, Average - 7.50
